contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=August 2009}} {{Infobox settlement | name = Mahajanga | native_name = | native_name_lang = | settlement_type = Province | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = image_caption | image_flag = | flag_alt = | image_seal = | seal_alt = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = Madagascar Mahajanga Province.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = Map of Madagascar with Mahajanga highlighted | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | latd = 16 |latm = 45 |lats = |latNS = S | longd = 46 |longm = 15 |longs = |longEW = E | coor_pinpoint = Capital | coordinates_type = | coordinates_display = inline,title | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Madagascar | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | seat_type = Capital | seat = [[Mahajanga]] | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric<!-- or US or UK --> | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 150023 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 1,896,000 | population_as_of = 2004 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = UTC+3 | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = | website = | footnotes = }} '''Mahajanga''' is a former [[provinces of Madagascar|province]] of [[Madagascar]] with an area of 150,023 kmÂ². It had a population of 1,896,000 (2004). Its capital was [[Mahajanga]]. Except for [[Fianarantsoa Province|Fianarantsoa]], Mahajanga Province bordered all of the country's other provinces: *[[Antsiranana Province|Antsiranana]] - north *[[Toamasina Province|Toamasina]] - east *[[Antananarivo Province|Antananarivo]] - southeast *[[Toliara Province|Toliara]] - southwest == Administrative divisions == [[Image:Mahajanga div.png|left|252px]] Mahajanga Province was divided into four regions - [[Betsiboka]], [[Boeny]], [[Melaky]] and [[Sofia Region|Sofia]]. These four regions became the first-level administrative divisions when the provinces were abolished in 2009. They are subdivided into 20 districts: {| | * [[Betsiboka]] region: ** 10. [[Kandreho District]] ([[Kandreho]]) ** 11. [[Maevatanana District]] ([[Maevatanana]]) ** 21. [[Tsaratanana District]] ([[Tsaratanana]]) * [[Boeny]] region: ** 1. [[Ambatoboeny District]] ([[Ambatoboeny]]) ** 12. [[Mahajanga II]] ** 13. [[Mahajanga]] ** 17. [[Marovoay District]] ([[Marovoay]]) ** 18. [[Mitsinjo District]] ([[Mitsinjo]]) ** 20. [[Soalala District]] ([[Soalala]]) * [[Melaky]] region: ** 2. [[Ambatomainty District]] ([[Ambatomainty]]) ** 4. [[Antsalova District]] ([[Antsalova]]) ** 8. [[Besalampy District]] ([[Besalampy]]) ** 14. [[Maintirano District]] ([[Maintirano]]) ** 19. [[Morafenobe District]] ([[Morafenobe]]) * [[Sofia Region|Sofia]] region: ** 3. [[Analalava District]] ([[Analalava]]) ** 5. [[Antsohihy District]] ([[Antsohihy]]) ** 6. [[Bealanana District]] ([[Bealanana]]) ** 7. [[Befandriana-Nord District]] ([[Befandriana-Nord]]) ** 9. [[Boriziny District]] ([[Boriziny]]) ** 15. [[Mampikony District]] ([[Mampikony]]) ** 16. [[Mandritsara District]] ([[Mandritsara]]) |} {{Subdivisions of Madagascar}} [[Category:Provinces of Madagascar]] [[Category:Mahajanga Province| ]] {{Madagascar-geo-stub}}
